title: You know that tanks are broken when even hyper carries cant do shit
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1839300270/37457358?tab=overview

This game speaks for itself.

I literally cannot do shit about his 60s cd free engage button and meanwhile he can kill me in 5 seconds without a single damage item all game, just righteous glory flip me into their team or even flash + that and there is nothing i can do because im not playing kalista (who doesnt even do damage to tanks).

Its fine though for tanks to be strong early mid and late game, to a point even kog cant do shit.
